channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT

item.title: Report E-2024080593
item.description:
Report E-2024080593

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-24
  • City: BUTTE
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that 1-quart of "Embreak 2112" released from a metal tote impacting the trailer floor. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller who felt comfortable handling the material with terminal-issued PPE available onsite.
